Hey,

I'm Brian.

I'm a front-end developer and designer who lives in San Francisco, and this is my soon-to-be-spiffy-but-currently-in-version-negative-one portfolio site.

I made this site because, well, doing something like that is just awesome -- but also so I can better share some of the things I create and learn. As such, until things are built in proper, please enjoy this cool textured teapot made with environmental mapping in WebGL and THREE.JS (or, alternatively, this glowing jump loader as a more apropos reflection of the current state).

Also, feel free to hit me up any time on Twitter @Brian_Sipple, or at some of my other locations:

  • GitHub
  • CodePen
  • Google Plus
  • LinkedIn

Cheers!
